thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Spongecell Merges With Flashtalking

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Spongecell Merges With Flashtalking
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Safeguard Scientifics Inc:
* SAFEGUARD SCIENTIFICS PARTNER COMPANY SPONGECELL MERGES WITH ADVERTISING TECHNOLOGY LEADER FLASHTALKING
* SAFEGUARD SCIENTIFICS INC - COâ€˜S ADVERTISING TECHNOLOGY PARTNER COMPANY SPONGECELL HAS MERGED WITH NEW YORK CITY-BASED FLASHTALKING
* SAFEGUARD SCIENTIFICS INC - TERMS OF ALL-STOCK TRANSACTION WERE NOT DISCLOSED
* SAFEGUARD SCIENTIFICS INC - CO MAINTAINS ONE BOARD SEAT OF COMBINED COMPANY AND HAS AN INITIAL OWNERSHIP INTEREST OF 10.3% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
